title: Battle of the Giants
description: Forget aerodynamics. This is 1000HP, 5 tons, and pure contact. Keep your brakes cool or lose them completely at the end of the straight.

keyMoments: Trucks hitting the speed limiter (160km/h) halfway down the straight
Water-cooled brakes steaming in every corner
The terrifying sight of a truck going side-by-side through the Senna S
raceContext.significance: Unique to Brazil and AMS2. Copa Truck is a fan favorite for its absurdity and close racing. Managing brake temperature is the primary skill.
